commit.message:
rs6000.c (rs6000_emit_prologue): Use frame_reg_rtx for SPE saves.

	* config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_emit_prologue): Use frame_reg_rtx
	for SPE saves.

From-SVN: r130774

+	for SPE saves.
